ਅਸੀਂ ਬਹੁਤ ਸਾਰੇ ਇੱਕ ਮਹੀਨੇ ਤੋਂ ਕੋਸ਼ਿਸ਼ ਕਰ ਰਹੇ ਸੀ

We had been trying for each month
asīṁ hara mahīnē kōśiśa kara rahē sī

asīṁ cagē haphatē la'ī kōśiśa kara rahē sī

We had been trying for the first week
asīṁ pahilē hafatē la'ī kōśiśa kara rahē sī

We had been leaving a good business
asīṁ ika cagā kārōbāra chaḍa rahē sī

We had been leaving each business
asīṁ harēka kārōbāra nū chaḍa rahē sī
